n,k=map(int,raw_input().split())
arr=map(int,raw_input().split())
arr.sort()
arr=filter(lambda x: x <=k, arr)
f=0


for i in range(0,len(arr)):
    
    brr=map(lambda x: x+arr[i] ,arr)
    brr[i]=-1
    

    if k in brr:
        f=1
        break
    
if f==1:
    print 'Yes'
else:
    print 'No'
